project_info.title: Follow Me
project_info.description: Website to help tourists find tours organized by locals. Developed with the Ruby on Rails framework.

project_info.title: Whack A Ship
project_info.description: Simple client-side game based on the traditional 'Whack a Mole' game.

project_info.title: Nutrition Calculator
project_info.description: Web-App helping to keep track of nutrition. Developed with Ruby on Rails. Development still ongoing.

project_info.title: Campaign Manager
project_info.description: Built with React, to display campaign information retrieved from json data.

project_info.title: Product Filter
project_info.description: Frontend application with the purpose to display and filter different designs available, using the Spoonflower API.
